sub_title: System Support Analyst | Systems Programmer | Infrastructure Operations Fintech |
summary:
As internationally experienced IT professional, I have 20+ years of experience working with intercultural teams. My focus is on taking on technical challenges and solving problems in fast-paced work environments. I enjoy working in a team where together we can make a difference and deliver improvements to create solutions that companies rely on, perform better and enhance reliability. Architecture, systems integration, enterprise security (RISC), web technologies, analysis, programming and systems support are a few of my strongest skills that I have developed working in the banking and telecom industries. The time has come to make the next step in my career. Systems integration and platform management in the Fintech industry should be among the main themes in my next position. I can work for any, preferably international, company (banks and others) in the Netherlands and am comfortable working both remote and on-site.

contact: eduardocorreia.work@gmail.com

school.name: Instituto Superior de Engenharia de Coimbra

profile_positions.description:
Assignment:
• Responsible for platform governance activities for EMEA UK cards and retail payments platform including:
• Modernization of legacy platform processes (RISC, monitoring, alerting reporting and automation).
• RISC management for 28 regional business units across EMEA (5,000+ assets)
• Planning and coordination of risk remediation (IT vulnerabilities and IT compliance).
• Providing management information reporting (OLA/SLA) and process improvement.

Results:
• Provided the capacity requirements for the EMEA deployment of Splunk Cloud on Microsoft Azure cloud platform.
• Delivered service SLA reporting solution (PowerBI platform) that improved incident visibility, root cause analysis and timely resolution. 
• Reports contributed to perform post incident impact analysis for clients, supported in SLA discussions and helped drive DEV improvements.
• Reduced and maintained the platform risk within PCI requirements.
profile_positions.title: Systems Support Analyst Specialist

profile_positions.description:

• Enhance the existing ING profile platform with automatic failover capabilities for high availability.

Results:
• ING Core Bank Profile with automatic failover capabilities for high availability
profile_positions.title: Systems Programmer Senior

profile_positions.description:
Assignment:
• Support the migration of loans and savings from legacy systems to the new core bank platform.
• Work on and coordinate capacity planning, training, information security, automation, process improvement, and performance tests.

Results:
• Completed the migration of ING loans and savings to the new core bank platform without P1 incidents and within the planned timeframe.
• Integrated the ING Profile platform in a continuous delivery/continuous deployment pipeline.
